hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#WildFly 12.0 source /home/test/.bashrc # Install packages echo `pwd` sudo yum install -y git wget tar
wget https://github.com/AdoptOpenJDK/openjdk9-releases/releases/download/jdk-9%2B181/OpenJDK9_s390x_Linux_jdk-9.181.tar.gz tar -xvzf OpenJDK9_s390x_Linux_jdk-9.181.tar.gz
# Download Apache Maven 3.3.9& set the variables wget https://archive.apache.org/dist/maven/maven-3/3.3.9/binaries/apache-maven-3.3.9-bin.tar.gz tar -xf apache-maven-3.3.9-bin.tar.gz
# Set the variables export JAVA_HOME=`pwd`/jdk-9+181 export PATH=$PATH:$JAVA_HOME/bin export PWD=`pwd`
export PATH=$PWD/apache-maven-3.3.9/bin:$PATH export PATH=$PATH:$PWD/wildfly/build/target/wildfly-12.0.0.Final/bin export MAVEN_OPTS="-Xmx1024m" export JBOSS_HOME=$PWD/wildfly/build/target/wildfly-12.0.0.Final java -version
git clone https://github.com/wildfly/wildfly.git cd wildfly git checkout 12.0.0.Final
# Build the Source mvn install #mvn -DsomeModule.test.excludes="**/*JmsClientTestCase.java" test -fn
#Verification # Start server in stand alone mode nohup sh ./dist/target/wildfly-12.0.0.Final/bin/standalone.sh -b 0.0.0.0 -bmanagement 0.0.0.0 & sleep 100s curl http://localhost:8080 sleep 100s
sleep 20s # Start server in domain mode nohup sh ./dist/target/wildfly-12.0.0.Final/bin/domain.sh -b 0.0.0.0 -bmanagement 0.0.0.0 & sleep 100s
sleep 100s # Check server response curl http://localhost:8080
